Question: This corps was commanded by this person and operated for less than two months.
Hints: This person used fasting as a political device, often threatening suicide unless demands were met.
This person stayed out of active politics and, as such, the limelight for most of the 1920s.
Life of Mohandas Karamchand **** in eight volumes, and Pyarelal and Sushila Nayyar with their Karamchand **** in 10 volumes.
